title: Disclaimer
text:
Website Disclaimer

This website provides general information about health, nutrition, and lifestyle. All materials published on the site or provided through it are intended for educational purposes only. The information should not be interpreted as professional advice or consultation. It is provided "as is" without any explicit or implied warranties.

Three Whales s.r.o. does not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the medical information published on this website. The content on this site does not replace professional advice from a doctor or other qualified healthcare provider.

If you suspect a medical condition or feel unwell, seek medical assistance immediately. Do not delay consulting a doctor, disregard professional advice, or discontinue prescribed treatment based on information found on this site. No materials from this website may be used for diagnosis, treatment, or prescribing therapeutic measures. Before making changes to your lifestyle, diet, or making other decisions, consult a healthcare professional.

This site may contain links to third-party websites. These links are provided for informational purposes only and do not constitute an endorsement of the accuracy or usefulness of the content found there. Three Whales s.r.o. is not responsible for the content of third-party websites and does not guarantee the information provided on those platforms. Using such resources is at your own risk.

This website does not promote, support, or endorse the use of prohibited substances, including narcotics or psychotropic substances. All materials are strictly for educational purposes. Three Whales s.r.o. is not liable for any links or materials that may be interpreted as endorsing the use of prohibited substances or other illegal activities.

Three Whales s.r.o. assumes no responsibility for any improper or inappropriate use of the information published on this website. Users bear full responsibility for any actions taken based on the materials provided.
